deployNewTokenLoanContract(address,uint2.details: deploy a new token loan contract, add its address to internal variables

params._borrowedAskAmount: , amount of crypto the borrower would like to receive
params._id: , number of the token loan contract
params._pairId: , name of the crypto the borrower would like to receive
params._rpbRate: , rate per block the borrower would like to pay as interest

getDeployedTokenLoanAddress(uint256).details: get deployed token loan contract address as an item of an array

returns._0: address of idx-th fund contract address

getDeployedTokenLoansCounter().details: get deployed token loans contract counter

returns._0: number of deployed token loans contracts

getFeesCollector().details: get the fee collector contract address

isBorrower(address).details: get if an address is a borrower

isTokenLoanDeployed(address).details: check if an fund contract address was deployed by this deployer

returns._0: true if fund address was deployed, otherwise false

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setFeesCollector(address).details: set the fee collector contract address

params._factAddr: , address of loan factory contract to add

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
